> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/297?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [f092b1d...b37b693](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/297?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

The `test_inspect_text` uses `Text` from `rich.text,` and indeed changes to `Text` may break it.
I will change it!
In the others tests I am testing the rendering of builtins like int, dict, print; unless I am missing something they shouldn't 
break by modifications in others parts of rich.
Looks good @taliraj Thanks. Probably is a good idea to use a builtin for that one test.
